name: Grave Juice
description:
You are an armored courier stuck in a loop of grave juice deliveries. The vials of grave juice you're delivering must make it to the delivery locations so the apothecary can make his money.  Be careful with the merchandise! There are traps scattered about the world that threaten the safety of the product.

Controls

  • W/D Move
  • SPACE jump
  • HOLD LEFT MOUSE - aim while carrying vial
  • MOVE LEFT MOUSE - change strength of throw
  • RELEASE LEFT MOUSE - throw vial
  • ESCAPE/P pause
